009package Ch09_AutomaticThresholding;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.askForSampleImage;
013import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
014import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
015
016import ij.ImagePlus;
017import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
018import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
019import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
020import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
021import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.SauvolaThresholder;
022import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.SauvolaThresholder.Parameters;
023import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
024
025/**
026 * <p>
027 * ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the {@link SauvolaThresholder} class.
028 * See Sec. 9.2 of [1] for additional details.
029 * </p>
030 * <p>
031 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
032 * </p>
033 *
034 * @author WB
035 * @version 2022/04/01
036 * @see imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.SauvolaThresholder
037 */
038public class Adaptive_Sauvola implements PlugInFilter {
039        
040        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
041        private static boolean showThresholdImage = false;
042        
043        /**
044         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
045         * is currently open.
046         */
047        public Adaptive_Sauvola() {
048                if (noCurrentImage()) {
049                        askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
050                }
051        }
052        
053        @Override
054        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
055                return DOES_8G;
056        }
057
058        @Override
059        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
060                
061                if (!runDialog(params))
062                        return;
063                
064                ByteProcessor I = (ByteProcessor) ip;
065                SauvolaThresholder thr = new SauvolaThresholder(params);
066                ByteProcessor Q = thr.getThreshold(I);
067                thr.threshold(I, Q);
068                
069                if (showThresholdImage) {
070                        (new ImagePlus("Sauvola-Threshold", Q)).show();
071                }
072        }
073        
074        boolean runDialog(Parameters params) {
075                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
076                addToDialog(params, gd);
077                
078                gd.showDialog();
079                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
080                        return false;
081                }
082
083                getFromDialog(params, gd);
084                return true;
085        }
086}
